verses.padam: - Padam yu~jjAnaḥ|prathamam|manaḥ|tatvAya̍|savitA|dhiya̍ḥ||agnim|jyOti̍ḥ|nicAyyEti̍# ni - cAyya|pRuthivyAḥ|adhi̍|Eti̍|aBarat||yuktvAya̍|mana̍sA|dEvAn|suva̍ḥ|yataḥ|dhiyA|diva̱m||bRuhat|jyOti̍ḥ|kariṣyataḥ|savitA|prEti̍|suvAti|tAn||yuktEna̍|mana̍sA|vayam|dEvasya̍|savituḥ|savE||suvargEyAyEti̍# suvaḥ - gEyAya|śaktyai̱||yu~jjatE̱|mana̍ḥ|uta|yu~jjatE|dhiya̍ḥ|viprA̱ḥ|vipra̍sya|bRuhataḥ|vipaścita̍ḥ||vIti̍|hOtrA̱ḥ|dadhE|vayunAviditi̍# vayuna - vit|Ekaḥ|it|1̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yu~jjAnaḥ prathamaM̍ manastatvAya̍# savitA dhiyaḥ|agniM̍ jyOtirnicAyya̍# pRuthivyA addhyA &Barat||yuktvAya̍ manasA̍ dEvAnth suvaryatO̍ dhiyA diva̱M|bRuhajjyOtiḥ̍ kariṣyataḥ savitA̍ prasuvAti̍ tAn||yuktEna manasA̍ vayaM dEvasya# savituḥ savE|suvargEyAya̍ śaktyai̱||yu~jjatE mana# uta yu~jjatE̍ dhiyO viprA viprasya̍ bRuhatO vipaścita̍ḥ|vi̍ hOtrA# dadhE vayunA vidEka in - [ ] 1

verses.padam: - Padam mahI|dEvasya|savituḥ|pari̍ṣṭutiriti̍ pari-stutiḥ||yujE|vAm|brahma̍|pUrvyam|namO̍Biriti̍ namaḥ̍ - Biḥ|vIti|ślOkA̱ḥ|yanti|pathyA̱|iva|sUrA̱ḥ||śRuṇvanti̍|viśvE̱|amRuta̍sya|putrAḥ|Eti̍|yE|dhAmA̍ni|divyAni̍|tasthuḥ||yasya̍|prayAṇamiti̍# pra - yAna̱m|anviti|anyE|it|yayuḥ|dEvAḥ|dEvasya̍|mahimAna̱m|arca̍taḥ||yaḥ|pArthi̍vAni|vimama̍ iti# vi - mamE|saḥ|Etaśaḥ|rajAṃ̍si|dEvaḥ|savitA|mahitvanEti̍# mahi-tvanA||dEva|savitaḥ|prEti̍|suva|yajñam|prEti̍|suva|2̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mahI dEvasya# savituḥ pariṣṭutiḥ||yujE̍ vAM brahma# pUrvyaM namOBirvi̍ ślOkA# yanti pathyEva̍ sUrA̱ḥ|śRuṇvanti viśvE# amRutasya̍ putrA A yE dhAmAni̍ divyAni# tasthuḥ||yasya# prayAṇamanvanya idyayurdEvA dEvasya# mahimAnamarcataḥ|yaḥ̍ pArthivAni̍ vimamE sa EtaśO̍ rajAṃsi̍ dEvaḥ savitA̍ mahitvanA||dEva̍# savitaḥ prasuva̍ yajñaM prasava̍ - [ ] 2

verses.padam: - Padam yajñapatimiti̍# yajña - patim|BagAya|divyaḥ|gandharvaḥ||kEtapUriti̍# kEta - pUḥ|kEta̱m|naḥ|punAtu|vAcaḥ|patiḥ|vAca̱m|adya|svadAti|naḥ||imam|naḥ|dEva|savitaḥ|yajñam|prEti̍|suva|dEvAyuvamiti̍# dEva - yuva̱m|saKividamiti# saKi - vida̱m|satrAjitamiti# satra - jita̱m|dhanajitamiti# dhana - jita̱m|suvarjitamiti# suvaḥ-jita̱m||RucA|stOma̱m|samiti|ad^^rdhaya|gAyatrEṇa̍|rathantaramiti̍# rathaM - taram||bRuhat|gAyatravartanIti̍# gAyatra - vartani||dEvasya|tvA|savituḥ|prasava̍ iti# pra - savE|aśvinO̱ḥ|bAhuByAmiti# bAhu - ByAm|pUṣṇaḥ|hastA̱ByAm|gAyatrEṇa|Canda̍sA|Eti̍|dadE|a~ggirasvat|aBri̍ḥ|asi|nAri̍ḥ|3̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yajñapatiM̍ BagAya̍ divyO gandharvaḥ|kEtapUḥ̍ kEtannaḥ̍ punAtu vAcaspatirvAcamadya̍ svadAti̍ naḥ||imaM nO# dEva savitaryajñaM prasuva̍ dEvAyuvaṃ# saKividaṃ# satrAjitaM̍ dhanajitaṃ# suvarjita̱M||RucA stOmaṃq samarddhaya̍ gAyatrEṇa# rathantaraM|bRuhad-gAyatrava̍rtani||dEvasya̍# tvA savituḥ prasavE̱̍ &śvinO̱rbAhuByA̱M pUṣṇO hastA̱ByAM gAyatrEṇa CandasA &&dadE&~ggirasvadaBri̍rasi̍ nAri# - [ ] 3

verses.padam: - Padam asi|pRuthivyAḥ|sadhasthAditi# sadha - sthAt|agnim|purIṣya̱m|a~ggirasvat|Eti|Bara|traiṣṭu̍BEna|tvA|Canda̍sA|Eti̍|dadE|a~ggirasvat|baBri̍ḥ|asi|nAri̍ḥ|asi|tvayA̱|vayam|sadhastha̍ iti# sadha - sthE|Eti|agnim|śakEma|Kani̍tum|purIṣya̱m|jAga̍tEna|tvA|Canda̍sA|Eti̍|dadE|a~ggirasvat|hastE̱|AdhAyEtyA̱̍ - dhAya|savitA|biBra̍t|aBri̱m|hiraṇyayI̱m||tayA̱|jyOti̍ḥ|aja̍sram|it|agnim|KAtvI|naḥ|Eti̍|Bara|Anu̍ṣṭuBEnEtyAnu̍# - stuBEna|tvA|CandasA̍ ( )|Eti|dadE|a~ggirasvat||4̍ (53)
verses.samhita: -rasi pRuthivyAḥ sadhasthAdagniM̍ purIṣya̍ma~ggirasvadA̍ Bara̍ traiṣṭuBEna̍ tvA CandasA &&dadE&~ggirasvad-baBri̍rasi̍ nArirasi̍ tvayA# vayaṃ sadhastha Agniṃ śakEma̍ KanituM̍ purIṣyaM̍ jAgatEna̍ tvA CandasA &&dadE&~ggirasvaddhasta̍# AdhAya# savitA biBradaBriṃ# hiraṇyayI̱M|tayA jyOtirajasra-midagniM̍ KAtvI na A BarAnuṣṭuBEna̍ tvA CandasA ( ) &&dadE&~ggirasvat||4̍

verses.padam: - Padam imAm|agRuBṇann|raśanAm|Rutasya|pUrvE̱|Ayu̍ṣi|vidathE̍ṣu|kavyA||tayA̱|dEvAḥ|sutam|Eti̍|baBUvuḥ|Rutasya̍|sAmann̍|saram|ArapantItyA̱̍ - rapantI||pratU̱rtamiti̍# pra - tUrtam|vAjinn|Eti|drava|vari̍ṣṭhAm|anviti̍|saM~Mvatamiti̍# saM - vata̱m||divi|tE|janma|paramam|antari̍kṣE|nABi̍ḥ|pRuthivyAm|adhIti̍|yOni̍ḥ||yu~jjAthA̱m|rAsa̍Bam|yuvam|asminn|yAmE̱|vRuṣaṇvasU̍ iti# vRuṣaṇ - vasU||agnim|Barantam|asmayumitya̍sma̍ - yum||yOgEyOga̍ iti yOgE̱ - yOgE|tavastaramiti̍# tavaḥ - taram|vAjEvAja̍ iti vAjE̱ - vAjE|havAmahE||saKAyaḥ|indra̱m|UtayE̱||pratUrvanniti̍# pra - tUrvann|5̍ (50)
verses.samhita: imAmagRuBṇan̍ raśanAmRutasya pUrva Ayuṣi̍ vidathEṣu̍ kavyA|tayA# dEvAḥ sutamA baBUvuṛ̍ Rutasya sAma̱nth saramArapantI||pratU̱rtaM̍ ~MvAjinnA drava̍ variṣṭhAmanu̍# saM~Mvata̱M|divi tE janma# paramamantarikṣE̍ nABiḥ̍ pRuthivyAmadhi yOniḥ||yu~jjAthAṃq̍ rAsaBaM̍ ~Myuvamasmin. yAmE# vRuṣaṇvasU|agniM BarantamasmayuM||yOgE̍yOgE̍ tavastaraM̍ ~MvAjEvAjE̍ havAmahE|saKAya̍ indramatayE̱||pratUrva-̍ [ ] 5

verses.padam: - Padam Eti|ihi|avakrAmannitya̍va̍ - krAmann|aśa̍stIḥ|rudrasya̍|gAṇa̍patyAditi̍ gAṇa# - patyAt|mayOBUriti# mayaḥ - BUḥ|Eti|ihi||uru|antari̍kṣam|anviti̍|ihi|svastiga̍vyUtiriti̍# svasti - gavyUtiḥ|aBayAni|kRuṇvann||pUṣṇA|sayujEti̍# sa - yujA̱|saha||pRuthivyAḥ|sadhasthAditi# sadha - sthAt|agnim|puriṣya̱m|a~ggirasvat|acCa|ihi|agnim|purIṣya̱m|a~ggirasvat|acCa̍|imaḥ|agnim|purIṣya̱m|a~ggirasvat|BariṣyAmaḥ|agnim|purIṣya̱m|a~ggirasvat|BarAmaḥ||anviti̍|agniḥ|uṣasA̱m|agra̱m|aKyat|anviti̍|ahA̍ni|prathamaḥ|jAtavE̍dA̍ iti# jAta - vEdAḥ||anviti|sUrya̍sya|6̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -nnEhyavakrAmannaśa̍stI̍ rudrasya gAṇapatyAn̍ mayOBUrEhi|urva̍ntari̍kṣamanvi̍hi̍ svasti gavyUtiraBa̍yAni̍ kRuṇvann||pUṣṇA sayujA# saha|pRuthivyAḥ sadhasthAdagniM̍ puriṣya̍-ma~ggirasva-dacCE̱hyagniM̍ purIṣya̍# -ma~ggirasvada-cCEmO&gniM̍ purIṣya̍-ma~ggirasvad-Ba̍riṣyAmO&gniM̍ purIṣya̍-ma~ggirasvad-Ba̍rAmaḥ||anvagniruṣasA-magra̍maKya-danvahA̍ni̍ prathamO jAtavEdAḥ|anu̍ sUryasya̍ - [ ] 6

verses.padam: - Padam purutrEti# puru - trA|ca|raśmIn|anviti|dyAvA̍pRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI|Eti|tatAna||AgatyEtyA̱̍ - gatya|vAjI|addhva̍naḥ|sarvA̱ḥ|mRudha̍ḥ|vIti̍|dhUnutE||agnim|sadhastha̍ iti# sadha - sthE|mahati|cakṣuṣA|nIti̍|cikIṣatE||AkramyEtyA̱̍ - kramya|vAjinn|pRuthivIm|agnim|icCa|rucA|tvam||BUmyA̱ḥ|vRutvAya̍|naḥ|brUhi|yata̍ḥ|KanA̍ma|tam|vayam||dyauḥ|tE|pRuṣṭham|pRuthivI|sadhasthamiti̍# sadha - stham|AtmA|antarikṣam|samudraḥ|tE|yOni̍ḥ||viKyAyEti̍# vi - KyAya|cakṣu̍ṣA|tvam|aBIti̍|tiṣṭha|7̍ (50)
verses.samhita: purutrA ca# raśmInanu dyAvApRuthivI̍ A tatAna||Agatya̍# vAjyaddhvanaḥ̍ sarvA mRudhO vidhUnutE|agniṃ̍ sadhasthE# mahati cakṣuṣA̍ ni cikIṣatE||Akramya̍# vAjin pRuthivImagnimicCa̍ rucA tvaM|BUmyA# vRutvAya# nO brUhi yataḥ KanAma̍ taM ~MvayaM||dyaustE# pRuṣṭhaM pRuthivI̍ sadhasthamAtmA̍ &ntarikṣaṃ̍ samudrastE yOniḥ|viKyAya̍ cakṣuṣA̍ tvamaBi tiṣṭha-̍ [ ] 7

verses.padam: - Padam pRutanyataḥ||uditi|krAma|mahatE|sauBa̍gAya|asmAt|AsthAnAdityA̱̍ - sthAnA̱t|draviṇOdA iti# draviṇaḥ - dAḥ|vAjinn||vayam|syAma|sumatAviti# su - matau|pRuthivyAḥ|agnim|Kaniṣyantaḥ|upastha̍ ityupa - sthE|asyAḥ||uditi|akramIt|draviṇOdA̍ iti# draviṇaḥ - dAḥ|vAjI|arvA̱|akaḥ|saḥ|lOkam|sukRu̍tamiti̍ su-kRutam|pRuthivyAḥ||tataḥ|KanEma|supratI̍kamiti̍# su-pratIkam|agnim|suva̍ḥ|ruhA̍ṇAḥ|adhIti̍|nAkE̱|uttama̍ ityut̍ - tamE||apaḥ|dEvIḥ|upEti|sRuja|madhu̍matIriti̍ madhu# - matIḥ|ayakṣmAya|prajABya̍ iti# pra-jAByaḥ||tAsA̱m|sthAnA̱t|uditi̍|jihatAm|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|supippalA̍ iti# su - pippalAḥ||jiGarmi|8̍ (50)
verses.samhita: pRutanyataḥ||utkrAma̍ mahatE sauBagAyA-smAdAsthAnA̱d̍ draviṇOdA vAjinn|vayaṅ̍ syAma̍ sumatau pRuthivyA̍ agniM Kaniṣyanta̍# upasthE# asyAḥ||udakramId̍ draviṇOdA vAjyarvA&kaḥ sa lOkaṃ sukRutaM̍ pRuthivyAḥ|tataḥ̍ KanEma supratIkamagniṃ̍ suvO ruhAṇA̍ adhi nAka# uttamE||apO dEvIrupa# sRuja madhumatIrayakṣmAya̍# prajAByaḥ|tAsAṅq̍ sthAnAdujjihatA-mOṣa̍dhayaḥ̍ supippalAḥ||jiGarmya-̍ [ ] 8

verses.padam: - Padam agnim|manasA|GRutEna̍|pratikṣyantamiti̍# prati - kṣyanta̱m|BuvanAni|viśvA̱||pRuthum|tiraścA|vaya̍sA|bRuhanta̱m|vyaci̍ṣṭham|anna̱m|raBasam|vidA̍nam||Eti̍|tvA|jiGarmi|vaca̍sA|GRutEna̍|arakṣasA̱|mana̍sA|tat|juṣasva||marya̍śrIriti̍ marya-śrIḥ|spRuhayadva̍rṇa̍ iti# spRuhayat - varṇaḥ|agniḥ|na|aBimRuśa ityaBi̍ - mRuśE̱|tanuvA̱|jaṛhRuṣAṇaḥ||parIti̍|vAja̍patiriti̍ vAja# - patiḥ|kaviḥ|agniḥ|havyAni|akramIt||dadha̍t|ratnA̍ni|dAśuṣE̱||parIti̍|tvA|agnE|pura̱m|vayam|vipra̱m|sahasya|dhImahi||dhRuṣadva̍rṇamiti̍# dhRuṣat - varṇam|divEdiva̍ iti# divE - divE|BEttAra̱m ( )|Ba~ggurAvata̍ iti# Ba~ggura - vataḥ||tvam|agnE|dyuBiriti dyu - Biḥ|tvam|Aśuśukṣaṇiḥ|tvam|adBya̍ ityat̍ - Byaḥ|tvam|aśmanaḥ|pari̍||tvam|vanE̱Byaḥ|tvam|Oṣa̍dhIBya̍ ityOṣadhi̍ - Byaḥ|tvam|nRuṇAm|nRupata iti# nRu-patE|jAyasE|śuciḥ||9̍ (70) ( pratUrvanth - sUryasya̍ - tiṣṭha - jiGarmi̍ - BEttAraM̍ - ~Mviṃśatiśca)̍ (A2)
verses.samhita: -gniM manasA̍ GRutEna# pratikṣyantaM BuvanAni̍ viśvA̱|pRuthuM tiraścA̍ vayasA̍ bRuhantaM ~Mvyaciṣṭhamannaṃ̍# raBasaM ~MvidAnaM||A̍ tvA# jiGarmi vacasA̍ GRutEnA&rakṣasA̍ manasA̍ tajjuṣasva|marya̍śrIḥ̍ spRuhayad-varṇO̍ agnirnA&BimRuśE# tanuvA jaṛhRuṣAṇaḥ||pari̍ vAjapatiḥ̍ kaviragniṛ havyAnyakramIt|dadhad̍ ratnAni̍ dAśuṣE̱||pari# tvA&gnE puraM̍ ~MvayaM ~Mvipraṃ# sahasya dhImahi|dhRuṣad varṇaM̍ divEdivE̍ BEttAraM̍ ( ) Ba~ggurAvataḥ||tvama̍gnE̍ dyuBistva-mAśuśukṣaṇistva-madByastva-maśma̍naspari̍|tvaM̍ ~MvanE̱Bya stvamOṣadhIBya̍ stvaM nRuṇAM nRupatE̍ jAyasE śuciḥ||9̍ (pratUrvanth - sUryasya̍ - tiṣṭha - jiGarmi̍ - BEttAraM̍ - ~Mviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam dEvasya|tvA|savituḥ|prasava̍ iti# pra - savE|aśvinO̱ḥ|bAhuByAmiti# bAhu - ByAm|pUṣṇaḥ|hastA̱ByAm|pRuthivyAḥ|sadhastha iti# sadha - sthE|agnim|purIṣya̱m|a~ggirasvat|KanAmi||jyOtiṣmantam|tvA|agnE|supratI̍kamiti̍# su - pratIkam|aja̍srEṇa|BAnunA̱|dIdyA̍nam||śivam|prajABya̍ iti# pra - jAByaḥ|ahiṃ̍santam|pRuthivyAḥ|sadhastha̍ iti# sadha - sthE|agnim|purIṣya̱m|a~ggirasvat|KanAmi||apAm|pRuṣṭham|asi|saprathA iti# sa - prathA̱ḥ|uru|agnim|Bariṣyat|parAvapiṣṭhamityapa̍rA̍ - vapiṣṭham||vad^^rdhamAnam|mahaḥ|Eti̍|ca|puṣka̍ram|divaḥ|mAtra̍yA|variṇA|prathasva||śarma̍|ca|sthaḥ|10̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEvasya# tvA savituḥ prasavE̱&śvinO̱̍ rbAhuByA̱M pUṣṇO hastA̱ByAM pRuthivyAḥ sadhasthE&gniM purIṣya̍-ma~ggirasvat̍ KanAmi||jyOti̍ṣmantaM̍ tvA&gnE supratIkamaja̍srEṇa̍ BAnunA dIdyAnaM|śivaM̍ prajAByO&hiṃ# santaM pRuthivyAḥ sadhasthE&gniM purIṣya̍# -ma~ggirasvat KanAmi||apAM̍ pRuṣṭhamasi̍ saprathA# urvagniM̍ Bariṣyadapa̍rAvapiṣṭhaM|varddha̍mAnaM̍ maha A ca puṣkaraM̍ divO mAtrayA̍ variṇA prathasva||śarma̍# ca sthO- [ ] 10

verses.padam: - Padam varma|ca|sthaḥ|acCi̍drE̍ iti|bahulE̍ iti|uBE̍ iti||vyaca̍svatI̍ iti|samiti̍|vasAthAm|Bartam|agnim|purIṣya̱m||samiti̍|vasAthAm|suvarvidEti̍# suvaḥ - vidA̱|samIcI iti|ura̍sA|tmanA̱||agnim|antaḥ|BariṣyantI̍ iti|jyOti̍ṣmantam|aja̍sram|it||purIṣya̍ḥ|asi|viśvaBa̍rA̍ iti# viśva - BarAḥ||atharvA|tvA|prathamaḥ|niriti̍|amanthat|agnE||tvAm|agnE|puṣka̍rAt|adhIti̍|atha̍rvA|niriti̍|amanthata||mUd^^rdhnaḥ|viśva̍sya|vAGata̍ḥ||tam|u|tvA|daddhya~g|Ruṣi̍ḥ|putraḥ|IdhE|11̍ (50)
verses.samhita: varma# ca sthO acCidrE̍ bahulE uBE|vyacasvatI̍ saM ~MvasAthAM̍ BartamagniM purIṣya̱M||saM~Mva̍sAthAṃ̍ suvarvidA# samIcI urasA̍ tmanA̱|agnimanta rBariṣyantI̍ jyOtiṣmanta̍ majasramit||purIṣyO̍&si̍ viśvaBarAḥ|atha̍rvA̍ tvA prathamO niramanthadagnE||tvAma̍gnE̍ puṣkarAdaddhyatha̍rvA̍ niramanthata|mUrddhnO̍ viśvasya̍ vAGataḥ||tamu̍# tvA daddhya~g~gRuṣiḥ̍ putra IdhE-̍ [ ] 11

verses.padam: - Padam atharvaṇaḥ||vRutrahaṇamiti̍# vRutra - hana̱m|purandaramiti# puraM - daram||tam|u|tvA|pAthyaḥ|vRuṣA̱|samiti|IdhE|dasyuhanta̍mamiti̍# dasyu-hantamam||dhana~jjayamiti̍# dhanaM - jayam|raṇEraṇa̍ iti raṇE̱-raṇE||sIda|hOtaḥ|svE|u|lOkE|cikitvAn|sAdaya̍|yajñam|sukRutasyEti̍# su-kRutasya|yOnau̱||dEvAvIriti̍# dEva-avIḥ|dEvAn|haviṣA̱|yajAsi|agnE̱|bRuhat|yajamAnE|vaya̍ḥ|dhAḥ||nIti̍|hOtA̱|hOtRuṣada̍na̍ iti# hOtRu-sadanE|vidA̍naḥ|tvEṣaḥ|dIdivAn|asadat|sudakṣa̍ iti# su - dakṣaḥ||ada̍bdhavrata̍ pramatirityadabdhavrata-pramatiḥ|vasi̍ṣṭhaḥ|sahasraBaMqra̍ iti# sahasraM-Baraḥ|śucijihva̍ iti śuci# - jihvaḥ|agniḥ||samiti|sIdasva|mahAn|asi|śOca̍sva|12̍ (50)
verses.samhita: atharvaṇaḥ|vRutrahaṇa̍M̍ purandaraM||tamu# tvA pAthyO vRuṣA samIdhE̍ dasyuhantamaM|dhana~jjayaṃ̍ raṇEraṇE||sIda̍# hOtaḥ sva u# lOkE cikitvAnth̍ sAdayA# yajñaṃ sukRutasya̍ yOnau̱|dEvAvIrdEvAn. haviṣA# yajAsyagnE# bRuhad-yajamAnE̍ vayO# dhAḥ||ni hOtA# hOtRuṣadanE̍ vidAnastvEṣO̍ dIdivAṃ̍ asadath̍ sudakṣaḥ|ada̍bdhavrata̍ pramatirvasiṣṭhaḥ̍ sahasraM Baraḥ śucijihvO̍ agniḥ||saṃ sIdasva̍ mahAṃ asi̍ śOcasva-̍ [ ] 12

verses.padam: - Padam dEvavItama̍ iti# dEva - vItamaḥ||vIti̍|dhUmam|agnE|aruṣam|miyEddhya|sRuja|praśastEti̍# pra - śasta|darq.śatam||janiṣva|hi|jEnya̍ḥ|agrE̱|ahnA̱m|hitaḥ|hitEṣu̍|aruṣaḥ|vanE̍ṣu||damE̍dama̍ iti damE̱ - damE|sapta|ratnA̱|dadhAnaḥ|agniḥ|hOtA̱|nIti̍|sasAda|yajI̍yAn||13̍ (27) (stha - IdhE - śOcasva̍ - saptaviṃśatiśca)̍ - (A3)
verses.samhita: dEvavItamaḥ|vi̍ dhUmamagnE̍ aruṣaM miyEddhya̍ sRuja praśasta̍ daṛśataM||janiṣvA̍ hi jEnyO agrE ahnAṃ# hitO hitEṣvaruṣO̍ vanEṣu|damE̍damE̍ sapta ratnA dadhAnO&gniṛhOtA̍ ni ṣasAdA̍ yajIyAn||13̍ (stha - IdhE - śOcasva̍ - saptaviṃśatiśca)̍ -

verses.padam: - Padam samiti|tE|vAyuḥ|mAtariśvA̱|dadhAtu|uttAnAyA̍ ityut̍ - tAnAyai̱|hRudayam|yat|vili̍ṣṭamiti̍ vi - liṣṭam||dEvAnA̱m|yaḥ|carati|prAṇathEnEti̍# pra - anathEna|tasmai̱|ca|dEvi|vaṣa̍ṭ|astu|tuBya̱m||sujA̍ta̍ iti su-jAtaḥ|jyOtiṣA|saha|śarma̍|varU̍tham|Eti̍|asadaḥ|suva̍ḥ||vAsa̍ḥ|agnE|viśvarU̍pamiti̍# viśva - rUpam|samiti|vyayasva|viBAvasO̍ iti# viBA-vasO||uditi|u|tiṣṭha|svaddhvarEti̍# su - addhvara|ava|naḥ|dEvyA|kRupA||dRuśE|ca|BAsA|bRuhatA|suśukvaniriti̍# su - śukvaniḥ|Eti̍|agnE|yAhi|suśastiBiriti̍# suśasti - Biḥ||14 (50)
verses.samhita: saM tE# vAyurmAtariśvA̍# dadhAtUttAnAyai hRudayaM̍ ~MyadviliṣṭaM|dEvAnAM̍ ~Myaścarati̍ prAṇathEna̍ tasmai# ca dEvi vaṣaḍastu̍ tuBya̱M||sujAtO̍ jyOtiṣA̍ saha śarma varUthamA&sa̍daḥ̍ suvaḥ|vAsO̍# agnE viśvarUpaṃq̍ saM~Mvyayasva̍ viBAvasO||udu# tiṣṭha svaddhvarAvA# nO dEvyA kRupA|dRuśE ca# BAsA bRuhatA̍ suśukvanirA&gnE̍# yAhi suśastiBiḥ||14̍

verses.padam: - Padam Ud^^rdhvaḥ|u|sviti|naḥ|UtayE̱|tiṣṭha̍|dEvaḥ|na|savitA||Ud^^rdhvaḥ|vAja̍sya|sani̍tA|yat|a~jjiBiritya~jji̍ - Biḥ|vAGadBiriti# vAGat - Biḥ|vihvayAmaha̍ iti# vi - hvayAmahE||saḥ|jAtaḥ|garBa̍ḥ|asi|rOda̍syOḥ|agnE̱|cAru̍ḥ|viBRu̍ta̍ iti vi - BRutaḥ|OṣadhIṣu||citraḥ|śiśu̍ḥ|parIti̍|tamAṃ̍sI|aktaḥ|prEti̍|mAtRuBya̍ iti# mAtRu - Byaḥ|adhIti|kani̍kradat|gAḥ||sthiraḥ|Bava|vIḍva̍~gga̍ iti# vIḍu - a~ggaḥ|Aśuḥ|Bava|vAjI|arvann||pRuthuḥ|Bava|suṣada iti# su - sadaḥ|tvam|agnEḥ|purIṣavAha̍na̍ iti# purIṣa - vAhanaḥ||śivaḥ|Bava|15̍ (50)
verses.samhita: Urddhva U ṣu ṇa# UtayE tiṣṭhA# dEvO na savitA|UrddhvO̍ vAjasya̍ sanitA̍ yada~jjiBi-rvAGadBi̍-rvihvayA̍mahE||sa̍ jAtO garBO# asi rOdasyOragnE̍ cArurviBRuta̍ OṣadhIṣu|citraḥ̍ śiśuḥ pari tamAṅsyaktaḥ̍ pra mAtRuByO adhi kanikradadgAḥ||sthirO̍ Bava̍ vIḍva~gga̍ AśurBava̍ vAjyarvann|pRuthurBa̍va̍ suṣadastvamagnEḥ purIṣavAha̍naḥ||śivO̍ Bava̍ - [ ] 15

verses.padam: - Padam prajABya iti# pra - jAByaḥ|mAnu̍ṣIByaḥ|tvam|a~ggiraḥ||mA|dyAvA̍pRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI|aBIti|śUśucaḥ|mA|antari̍kṣam|mA|vanaspatIn̍||prEti̍|Etu|vAjI|kani̍kradat|nAna̍dat|rAsa̍Baḥ|patvA̱||Barann̍|agnim|purIṣya̱m|mA|pAdi|Ayu̍ṣaḥ|purA||rAsa̍Baḥ|vAm|kani̍kradat|suyu̍kta̍ iti su - yuktaḥ|vRuṣaṇA|rathE̱||saḥ|vAm|agnim|purIṣya̱m|Aśuḥ|dUtaḥ|vahAt|itaḥ||vRuṣA̱|agnim|vRuṣaṇam|Barann̍|apAm|garBa̱m|samudriya̱m||agnE̱|Eti̍|yAhi|16̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prajAByO mAnuṣIByastvama̍~ggiraḥ|mA̍ dyAvApRuthivI̍ aBi śUśucO̍ mA&ntarikṣaM̍ mA vanaspatIn||praitu̍# vAjI kanikrada-nnAna̍dad-rAsa̍Baḥ̍ patvA̱|BarannagniM̍ purIṣya̍M̍ mA pAdyAyuṣaḥ̍ purA||rAsaBO̍ vAM kanikradath̍ suyuktO̍ vRuṣaṇA rathE̱|sa vAmagniM̍ purIṣya̍mAśurdUtO̍ vahAditaḥ||vRuṣA&gniM̍ ~MvRuṣaṇaM̍ BarannapAM̍ garBaṃ# samudriya̱M|agna A yAhi-̍ [ ] 16

verses.padam: - Padam vItayE̱|Rutam|satyam||Oṣadhayaḥ|pratIti̍|gRuhṇIta|agnim|Etam|śivam|AyantamityA̱̍ - yanta̱m|aBIti|atra̍|yuṣmAn||vyasyanniti̍# vi - asyann|viśvA̱ḥ|ama̍tIḥ|arA̍tIḥ|niṣIdanni̍ ti# ni - sIdann|naḥ|apEti̍|durmatimiti̍# duḥ- matim|hanat||Oṣadhayaḥ|pratIti̍|mOdaddhvam|Enam|puṣpA̍vatIriti̍ puṣpa# - vatIḥ|supippalA iti# su - pippalAḥ||ayam|vaḥ|garBaḥ|Rutviya̍ḥ|pratnam|sadhasthamiti̍# sadha-stham|Eti|asadat||17̍ (36) (suśastiBiḥ̍ - śivO Bava̍ - yAhi - ṣaṭtriṃśacca)̍ (A4)
verses.samhita: vItaya# Rutaṃ satyaM||Oṣadhayaḥ̍ prati# gRuhṇItA&gnimEtaṃ śivamAyantamaByatra̍# yuṣmAn|vyasyan viśvA amatIrarA̍tI-rniṣIda̍nnO̍ apa# durmatiṃ hanat||Oṣa̍dhayaḥ̍ prati# mOdaddhvamEnaM puṣpAvatIḥ̍ supippalAḥ|ayaM ~MvO garBa# Rutviyaḥ̍ pratnaṃ sadhasthamA &sadat||17̍ (suśastiBiḥ̍ - śivO Bava̍ - yAhi - ṣaṭtriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam vIti|pAja̍sA|pRuthunA̱|śOśu̍cAnaḥ|bAdha̍sva|dviṣaḥ|rakṣasa̍ḥ|amI̍vAḥ||suśarma̍ṇa̍ iti# su - śarmaṇaḥ|bRuhataḥ|śarma̍ṇi|syAm|agnEḥ|aham|suhavasyEti̍# su-havasya|praṇI̍tAviti̍ pra-nItau||Apaḥ|hi|stha|mayOBuva̍ iti# mayaḥ-Buvaḥ|tAḥ|naḥ|UrjE|dadhAtana||mahE|raṇA̍ya|cakṣa̍sE||yaḥ|vaḥ|śivata̍ma̍ iti# śiva-tamaḥ|rasaḥ|tasya̍|BAjayata|iha|naḥ||uśatIḥ|iva|mAtara̍ḥ||tasmai̱|ara̱m|gamAma|vaḥ|yasya̍|kṣayA̍ya|jinva̍tha||Apa̍ḥ|janaya̍tha|ca|naḥ||mitraḥ|18̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vi pAjasA̍ pRuthunA śOśucAnO̍ bAdhasva̍ dviṣO rakṣasO amIvAḥ|suśarma̍ṇO̍ bRuhataḥ śarmaṇi̍ syAmagnErahaṃ suhavasya̍ praṇItau||ApO̍ hi ṣṭhA mayOBuvastA̍ na# UrjE dadhAtana|mahE̍ raṇAya̍ cakṣasE||yO̍ vaḥ̍ śivatamO̍ rasastasya# BAjayatEha naḥ|uśatIri̍va̍ mAtaraḥ||tasmA̍ araM̍ gamAma vO yasya kṣayAya̍ jinvatha|ApO̍# janayathA̍ ca naḥ||mitraḥ - [ ] 18

verses.padam: - Padam saṃqsRujyEti# saM - sRujya|pRuthivIm|BUmi̱m|ca|jyOti̍ṣA|saha||sujA̍tamiti̍ su - jAtam|jAtavEdasamiti̍# jAta-vEdasam|agnim|vaiśvAnaram|viBumiti# vi - Bum||ayakṣmAya|tvA|samiti̍|sRujAmi|prajABya̍ iti# pra-jAByaḥ||viśvE̱|tvA|dEvAḥ|vaiśvAnarAḥ|samiti̍|sRujantu|Anu̍ṣṭuBEnEtyAnu̍-stuBEna|Canda̍sA|a~ggirasvat||rudrAḥ|saBRuMtyEti̍# saM - BRutya|pRuthivIm|bRuhat|jyOti̍ḥ|samiti̍|IdhirE||tEṣA̱m|BAnuḥ|aja̍sraḥ|it|śukraḥ|dEvEṣu̍|rOcatE||saṃsRu̍ṣṭAmiti̍ saM - sRuṣṭAm|vasuBiriti̍ vasu# - Biḥ|rudraiḥ|dhIrai̱ḥ|karmaṇyA̱m|mRuda̱m||hastA̱ByAm|mRudvIm|kRutvA|sinIvAlI|karOtu|19 (50)
verses.samhita: saṃqsRujya# pRuthivIM BUmiM̍ ca jyOtiṣA̍ saha|sujAtaM̍ jAtavEdasamagniM̍ ~Mvai̱śvAnaraM ~MviBuM||ayakṣmAya# tvA saṃ sRujAmi̍ prajAByaḥ|viśvE̱̍ tvA dEvA vai̱śvAnarAḥ saṃ sRujantvA-nu̍ṣṭuBEna̍ CandasA&~ggirasvat||rudrAḥ̍ saBRuMtya# pRuthivIM bRuhajjyOtiḥ samIdhirE|tEṣA̱M̍ BAnurajasra̍ icCukrO dEvEṣu# rOcatE||saṃ sRuṣṭAM̍ ~MvasuBI̍ rudrairddhIrai̱ḥ karmaṇyA̱M mRuda̱M|hastA̱ByAM mRudvIM kRutvA sinIvAlI̍ karOtu̍ - [ ] 19

verses.padam: - Padam tAm||sinIvAlI|sukapardEti# su - kapardA|sukurIrEti# su - kurIrA|svaupaśEti# su - aupaśA||sA|tuBya̱m|aditE|mahE|Eti|uKAm|dadhAtu|hasta̍yOḥ||uKAm|karOtu|śaktyA̱|bAhuByAmiti̍# bAhu - ByAm|aditiḥ|dhiyA||mAtA|putram|yathA̱|upastha̍ ityupa - sthE|sA|agnim|biBartu|garBE̱|A||maKasya|śira̍ḥ|asi|yajñasya̍|padE̍ iti|sthaḥ||vasa̍vaḥ|tvA|kRuṇvantu|gAyatrEṇa̍|Canda̍sA|a~ggirasvat|pRuthivI|asi|rudrAḥ|tvA|kRuṇvantu|traiṣṭu̍BEna|Canda̍sA|a~ggirasvat|antari̍kṣam|asi|20̍ (50)
verses.samhita: tAM||sinIvAlI sukapardA̍ sukurIrA̍ svaupaśA|sA̍ tuByamaditE̍ maha OKAM dadhAtu̍ hastayOḥ||uKAM̍ karOtu̍ śaktyA# bAhuByA-maditirddhiyA|mAtA̍ putraM ~MyathOpasthE sA&gniM biBartu̍ garBa A||maKasya śirO&si̍ yajñasya# padE sthaḥ|vasa̍vastvA̍ kRuṇvantu gAyatrEṇa CandasA̍ &~ggirasvat pRuthivya̍si̍ rudrAstvA# kRuṇvantu traiṣṭuBEna̍ CandasA̍ &~ggirasvadantarikṣamasyA̍ - [ ] 20

verses.padam: - Padam AdityAḥ|tvA|kRuṇvantu|jAgatEna|Canda̍sA|a~ggirasvat|dyauḥ|asi|viśvE̱|tvA|dEvAḥ|vaiśvAnarAḥ|kRuṇvantu|Anu̍ṣṭuBEnEtyAnu̍# - stuBEna|CandasA|a~ggirasvat|diśa̍ḥ|asi|dhruvA|asi|dhAraya̍|mayi̍|prajAmiti̍# pra-jAm|rAyaḥ|pOṣa̱m|gaupatyam|suvIryamiti# su - vIrya̱m|sajAtAniti# sa - jAtAn|yajamAnAya|adi̍tyai|rAsnA̱|asi|adi̍tiḥ|tE|bila̱m|gRuhṇAtu|pA~gktE̍na|Canda̍sA|a~ggirasvat||kRutvAya̍|sA|mahIm|uKAm|mRunmayImiti̍# mRut-mayI̱m|yOni̱m|agnayE̱||tAm|putrEByaḥ|sam|prEti̍# ( )|ayacCat|aditiḥ|śrapayAn̍|iti̍||21̍ (54)
verses.samhita: -dityAstvA# kRuṇvantu jAgatEna̍ CandasA&~ggirasvad̍ dyaurasi̍ viśvE̱ tvA dEvA vai̱śvAnarAḥ kRuṇvantvAnu̍ṣṭuBEna̍ CandasA-&~ggirasvad-diśO̍&si̍ dhruvA&si# dhArayA mayi# prajAṃ rAyaspOṣaM̍ gaupatyaṃ suvIryaṃ# sajAtAn. yajamAnAyA&di̍tyai̍ rAsnA&sya ditistE̍ bilaM̍ gRuhṇAtu pA~gktEna̍ CandasA̍ &~ggirasvat||kRutvAya sA mahImuKAM mRunmayIM ~MyOnimagnayE̱|tAM̍ putrEByaḥ saM prA ( ) yacCadadi̍tiḥ̍ śrapayAniti||21̍

verses.padam: - Padam vasavaḥ|tvA|dhUpayantu|gAyatrEṇa̍|Canda̍sA|a~ggirasvat|rudrAḥ|tvA|dhUpayantu|traiṣṭu̍BEna|Canda̍sA|a~ggirasvat|AdityAḥ|tvA|dhUpayantu|jAga̍tEna|Canda̍sA|a~ggirasvat|viśvE̱|tvA|dEvAḥ|vaiśvAnarAḥ|dhUpayantu|Anu̍ṣṭuBEnEtyAnu̍# - stuBEna|CandasA|a~ggirasvat|indra̍ḥ|tvA|dhUpayatu|a~ggirasvat|viṣṇu̍ḥ|tvA|dhUpayatu|a~ggirasvat|varu̍ṇaḥ|tvA|dhUpayatu|a~ggirasvat|adi̍tiḥ|tvA|dEvI|viśvadE̱vyAvatIti̍# viśvadE̱vya - vatI|pRuthivyAḥ|sadhastha iti# sadha - sthE|a~ggirasvat|Kanatu|avaṭa|dEvAnA̱m|tvA|patnI̱ḥ|22 (50)
verses.samhita: vasavastvA̍ dhUpayantu gAyatrEṇa CandasA&~ggirasvad-rudrAstvA̍# dhUpayantu traiṣṭuBEna̍ CandasA&~ggirasva-dA̍dityAstvA̍# dhUpayantu jAgatEna̍ CandasA&~ggirasvad-̍ viśvE̱ tvA dEvA vai̱śvAnarA dhUpayantvAnu̍ṣṭuBEna̍ CandasA&~ggirasva-dindra̍stvA̍ dhUpayatva~ggirasvad -viṣṇustvA̍ dhUpayatva~ggirasvad-varuṇastvA̍ dhUpayatva~ggirasva-daditistvA̍ dEvI viśvadE̱vyAvatI pRuthivyAḥ sadhasthE̱&~ggirasvat Kanatvavaṭa̍ dEvAnA̱M tvA patnI̱ - [ ] 22

verses.padam: - Padam dEvIḥ|viśvadE̱vyAvatIriti# viśvadE̱vya - vatIḥ|pRuthivyAḥ|sadhastha iti# sadha - sthE|a~ggirasvat|dadhatu|uKE|dhiṣaṇA̱ḥ|tvA|dEvIḥ|viśvadE̱vyAvatIriti# viśvadE̱vya - vatIḥ|pRuthivyAḥ|sadhastha iti# sadha - sthE|a~ggirasvat|aBIti|indhatAm|uKE|gnAḥ|tvA|dEvIḥ|viśvadE̱vyAvatIriti̍# viśvadE̱vya - vatIḥ|pRuthivyAḥ|sadhastha iti# sadha - sthE|a~ggirasvat|śrapayantu|uKE|varU̱trayaḥ|janayaḥ|tvA|dEvIḥ|viśvadE̱vyAvatIriti̍# viśvadE̱vya - vatIḥ|pRuthivyAḥ|sadhastha iti# sadha - sthE|a~ggirasvat|pacantu|uKE||mitra|EtAm|uKAm|paca|EṣA|mA|BEdi||EtAm|tE|parIti̍|dadAmi|aBi̍ttyai||aBIti̍|imAm|23̍ (50)
verses.samhita: rdEvI rviśvadE̱vyAvatIḥ pRuthivyAḥ sadhasthE̱&~ggirasvad-dadhatUKE̍ dhiṣaṇA̱stvA dEvIrviśvadE̱vyAvatIḥ pRuthivyAḥ sadhasthE̱-&~ggirasva-daBIndhatAmuKE̍ gnAstvA# dEvIrviśvadE̱vyAvatIḥ pRuthivyAḥ sadhasthE̱&~ggirasva-cCrapayantUKE̍ varU̱trayO janayastvA̍ dEvIrviśvadE̱vyAvatIḥ pRuthivyAḥ sadhasthE̱&~ggirasvat pacantUKE|mitraitAmuKAM̍ pacaiṣA̍ mA BEdi|EtAM̍ tE pari# dadAmyaBittyai||aBImAM̍ - [ ] 23

verses.padam: - Padam mahinA|diva̱m|mitraḥ|baBUva|saprathA iti# sa - prathA̱ḥ||uta|śravasA|pRuthivIm||mitrasya̍|carq.ṣaṇIdhRuta̍ iti# caṛṣaṇi - dhRutaḥ|śrava̍ḥ|dEvasya̍|sAnasim||dyumnam|citraśra̍vastamamiti̍# citraśravaḥ̍ - tamam||dEvaḥ|tvA|savitA|uditi|vapatu|supAṇiriti̍# su - pAṇiḥ|sva~gguririti# su - a~gguriḥ||subAhuriti# su - bAhuḥ|uta|śaktyA̱||apadyamAnA|pRuthivi|AśA̱ḥ|diśa̍ḥ|Eti̍|pRuṇa||uditi̍|tiṣṭha|bRuhatI|Bava|Ud^^rdhvA|tiṣṭha|dhruvA|tvam||vasa̍vaḥ|tvA|Eti̍|CRundantu|gAyatrEṇa̍|Canda̍sA|a~ggirasvat|rudrAḥ|tvA|Eti̍|CRundantu̍ ( )|traiṣṭuBEna|Canda̍sA|a~ggirasvat|AdityAḥ|tvA|Eti̍|CRundantu|jAga̍tEna|Canda̍sA|a~ggirasvat|viśvE̱|tvA|dEvAḥ|vaiśvAnarAḥ|Eti̍|CRundantu|Anu̍ṣṭuBEnEtyAnu̍# - stuBEna|CandasA|a~ggirasvat||24̍ (69) (patnI# - rimAṃ - rudrAstvA&& cCRundantvE̍ - kAnna viṃśatiśca̍)̍ (A6)
verses.samhita: mahinA̍ divaM̍ mitrO baBUva̍ saprathA̱ḥ|uta śravasA̍ pRuthivIM||mitrasya# caṛṣaṇIdhRutaḥ śravO# dEvasya# sAnasiM|dyumnaM citraśravastamaM||dEvastvA̍# savitOdvapatu̍ supAṇiḥ sva~gguriḥ|subAhuruta̍ śaktyA̱||apadyamAnA̍ pRuthivyAśA diśa A pRuṇa|utti̍ṣṭha̍ bRuhatI BavOrddhvA̍ tiṣṭha̍ dhruvA tvaM||vasavastvA̍ &&cCRundantu̍ gAyatrEṇa CandasA&~ggirasvad̍ rudrAstvA&& cCRundantu̍ ( ) traiṣṭuBEna̍ CandasA&~ggirasva-dA̍dityAstvA̍ &&cCRundantu̍ jAgatEna̍ CandasA&~ggirasvad-viśvE̱̍ tvA dEvA vai̱śvAnarA A cCRundantvAnu̍ṣṭuBEna̍ CandasA&~ggirasvat||24̍ (patnI# - rimAṃ - rudrAstvA&& cCRundantvE̍ - kAnna viṃśatiśca̍)̍

verses.padam: - Padam samA̱ḥ|tvA|agnE|Rutavaḥ|vad^^rdhayantu|sa~MvaMqthsarA̍ iti# saM-vathsarAḥ|Ruṣayaḥ|yAni̍|satyA||samiti̍|divyEna̍|dIdihi|rOcanEna̍|viśvA̱ḥ|Eti̍|BAhi|pradiśa̍ iti# pra - diśaḥ|pRuthivyAḥ||samiti̍|ca|iddhyasva̍|agnE|prEti̍|ca|bOdhaya|Enam|uditi̍|ca|tiṣṭha|mahatE|sauBa̍gAya||mA|ca|riṣat|upasattEtyu̍pa̍ - sattA|tE|agnE|brahmAṇaḥ|tE|yaśasa̍ḥ|santu|mA|anyE||tvAm|agnE|vRuṇatE|brAhmaṇAḥ|imE|śivaḥ|agnE|25̍ (50)
verses.samhita: samA̱stvA&gna RutavO# varddhayantu saM~MvathsarA RuṣayO̍ yAni# satyA|saM divyEna# dIdihi rOcanEna viśvA A BAhi̍ pradiśaḥ̍ pRuthivyAḥ||saM cEddhyasvA̱&gnE pra ca# bOdhayainamucca# tiṣṭha mahatE sauBagAya|mA̍ ca# riṣadupasattA tE# agnE brahmAṇastE̍ yaśasaḥ̍ santu mA&nyE||tvAmagnE̍ vRuṇatE brAhmaṇA imE śivO agnE̍ - [ ] 25

verses.padam: - Padam saM~Mvaraṇa̍ iti# saM - varaṇE|Bava|naḥ||sapatnahEti̍# sapatna-hA|naḥ|aBimAtijidityaBimAti̍ - jit|ca|svE|gayE̱|jAgRuhi|aprayucCannityapra̍# - yucCann||iha|Eva|agnE|adhIti|dhAraya|rayim|mA|tvA|nIti̍|krann|pUrvacita̍ iti# pUrva - citaḥ|nikAriṇa̍ iti# ni - kAriṇaḥ||kṣatram|agnE|suyamamiti̍# su - yama̱m|astu|tuBya̱m|upasattEtyupa-sattA|vad^^rdhatAm|tE|ani̍ṣṭRutaḥ||kṣatrEṇa̍|agnE|svAyuriti̍# su - Ayuḥ|samiti̍|raBasva|mitrEṇa̍|agnE|mitradhEya̍ iti# mitra - dhEyE̱|yatasva||sajAtAnAmiti# sa - jAtAnA̱m|maddhyamasthA iti# maddhyama-sthAḥ|Edhi|rAjñA̱m|agnE|vihavya# iti# vi - havyaḥ|dIdihi|iha||atIti̍|26̍ (50)
verses.samhita: saM ~MvaraṇE̍ BavA naḥ|sapatnahA nO# aBimAtijicca svE gayE# jAgRuhya prayucCann||ihaivAgnE̍ adhi# dhArayA rayiM mA tvA nikran̍ pUrvacitO# nikAriṇaḥ|kṣatrama̍gnE̍ suyamamastu̍ tuByamupasattA̍ varddhatAM̍ tE aniṣṭRutaḥ||kṣatrEṇA̱&gnE̍ svAyuḥ saṃ raBasva̍ mitrEṇA̱&gnE mitradhEyE# yatasva|sajAtAnA̱M maddhyamasthA Edhi̍ rAjñAmagnE̍ vihavyO# dIdihIha||ati - [ ] 26

verses.padam: - Padam nihaḥ|atIti̍|sridha̍ḥ|atIti̍|aci̍ttim|atIti̍|arA̍tim|agnE||viśvA̱|hi|agnE|duritEti̍# duḥ - itA|sahasva|atha̍|asmaByamityasma̍ - Byam|sahavIrAmiti̍# saha - vIrAm|rayim|dAḥ||anAdhRuṣya ityanA̍ - dhRuṣyaḥ|jAtavEdA̍ iti# jAta - vEdAḥ|aniṣṭRutaḥ|virAḍiti̍# vi - rAṭ|agnE|kṣatraBRuditi# kṣatra - BRut|dIdihi|iha||viśvA̱ḥ|AśA̱ḥ|pramu~jcanniti# pra - mu~jcann|mAnuṣIḥ|Biyaḥ|śivABi̍ḥ|adya|parIti̍|pAhi|naḥ|vRudhE||bRuha̍spatE|savitaḥ|bOdhaya̍|Enam|saṃśi̍tamiti̍ saM - śitam|cit|sataMqrAmiti# saM - tarAm|samiti|śiśAdhi||vad^^rdhaya̍|Enam|mahatE|sauBa̍gAya|27̍ (50)
verses.samhita: nihO ati sridhO &tyacitti-matyarA̍timagnE|viśvA̍ hyagnE̍ duritA sahasvAthAsmaByaṃ# sahavIrAṃ̍ rayindA̱ḥ||anAdhRuṣyO jAtavadA̍ aniṣṭRutO̍ virAḍagnE̍ kṣatraBRud-dIdihIha|viśvA̍ AśA̱ḥ pramu~jcan mAnuṣIrBiyaḥ̍ śivABiradya̍ pari# pAhi nO vRudhE||bRuhaspatE̍ savitarbOdhayainaṃq̍ saṃśitaM̍ cithsaM tarAṃ saṃ śiśAdhi|varddhayai̍naM̍ mahatE sauBagAya-̍ [ ] 27

verses.padam: - Padam viśvE̱|Enam|anviti|madantu|dEvAḥ||amutraBUyAditya̍mutra̍ - BUyA̱t|adha|yat|yamasya̍|bRuha̍spatE|aBiśa̍stErityaBi̍ - śastEḥ|amu~jcaḥ||pratIti̍|auhatAm|aśvinA̱|mRutyum|asmAt|dEvAnA̱m|agnE|BiṣajA̱|śacI̍Biriti̍ śaci# - Biḥ||uditi|vayam|tama̍saḥ|parIti̍|paśya̍ntaḥ|jyOti̍ḥ|utta̍ramityut̍ - taram||dEvam|dEvatrEti# dEva - trA|sUrya̱m|aganma|jyOti̍ḥ|uttamamityu̍t̍ - tamam||28 (34) (imE śivO agnE - &ti - sauBagAya̍ - catustriṃśacca)̍ (A7)
verses.samhita: viśva# Enamanu# madantu dEvAḥ||amutraBUyAdadha yadyamasya bRuhaspatE̍ aBiśastEra̍ mu~jcaḥ|pratyau̍hatA-maśvinA̍# mRutyumasmAd̍ dEvAnA-magnE̍ BiṣajA śacIBiḥ||udvayaM̍ tamasaspari̍ paśyantO̍ jyOtiruttaraM|dEvaM̍ dEvatrA̍ sUryamaganma̍ jyOtiruttamaM||28̍ (imE śivO agnE - &ti - sauBagAya̍ - catustriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam Ud^^rdhvAḥ|asya|samidha iti# saM-idhaḥ|Bavanti|Ud^^rdhvA|śukrA|śOcIṃṣi̍|agnEḥ||dyumattamEti̍# dyumat - tamA|supratIkasyEti̍# su - pratIkasya|sUnOḥ||tanUnapAditi̍ tanU̱-napA̱t|asuraḥ|viśvavE̍dA̍ iti# viśva-vEdAḥ|dEvaḥ|dEvEṣu|dEvaḥ||pathaḥ|Eti̍|anakti|maddhvA̱|GRutEna̍||maddhvA̱|yajñam|nakṣasE|prIṇAnaḥ|narAśaṃsa̍ḥ|agnE||sukRuditi̍# su - kRut|dEvaḥ|savitA|viśvavAra̍ iti# viśva - vAraḥ||acCa|ayam|Eti|śava̍sA|GRutEna̍|IḍAnaḥ|vahni̍ḥ|nama̍sA||agnim|sruca̍ḥ|addhvarEṣu̍|prayathsviti̍# prayat - su||saḥ|yakṣat|asya|mahimAna̱m|agnEḥ|saḥ|29 (50)
verses.samhita: UrddhvA asya̍ samidhO# BavantyUrddhvA śukrA śOcIṅṣyagnEḥ|dyumattamA̍ supratIkasya̍ sUnOḥ||tanUnapAdasurO̍ viśvavEdA̍ dEvO dEvEṣu# dEvaḥ|patha A&nakti̍ maddhvA# GRutEna||maddhvA̍# yajñaM nakṣasE̍ prIṇAnO narAśaṃsO# agnE|sukRuddEvaḥ savitA̍ viśvavAraḥ||acCAyamE̍ti̍ śavasA̍ GRutEnEḍAnO̍ vahnirnamasA|agniṅ̍ srucO# addhvarEṣu# prayathsu||sa̍ yakṣadasya̍ mahimAnamagnEḥ̍ sa - [ ] 29

verses.padam: - Padam Im|mandrAsu|prayasa̍ḥ||vasu̍ḥ|cEti̍ṣṭhaḥ|vasudhAta̍ma̍ iti# vasu - dhAtamaḥ|ca||dvAra̍ḥ|dEvIḥ|anviti̍|asya|viśvE̱|vratA|dadantE|agnEḥ||uruvyaca̍sa̍ ityuru̍ - vyacasaḥ|dhAmnA̱|patya̍mAnAḥ||tE̍ iti|asya|yOṣa̍ṇE̍ iti|divyE̍ iti|na|yOnau̱|uṣAsAnaktA̱||imam|yajñam|avatAm|addhvaram|naḥ||daivyA̱|hOtArau|Ud^^rdhvam|addhvaram|naḥ|agnEḥ|jihvAm|aBIti̍|gRuṇItam||kRuṇutam|naḥ|svi̍ṣṭimiti̍ su-iṣṭim||tisraḥ|dEvIḥ|barqḥiḥ|Eti|idam|sadantu|iḍA̱|sara̍svatI|30̍ (50)
verses.samhita: I# mandrAsu# prayasaḥ|vasuścEti̍ṣṭhO̍ vasudhAtamaśca||dvArO̍# dEvIranvasya̍ viśvE̱ vratA dadantE̍ agnEḥ|uruvyacasO̍ dhAmnA patyamAnAḥ||tE̍ asya̍ yOṣaṇE̍ divyE na yOnAvuṣAsAnaktA̱|imaM̍ ~MyajñamavatA̍ maddhvaraM naḥ||daivyA̍# hOtArAvUrddhva-maddhvaraM̍ nO&gnErjihvAmaBi gRuṇItaM|kRuṇutaM̍ naḥ sviṣṭiM||tisrO̍ dEvIrbarqḥirEdaṃ sadantviḍA̍ sarasvatI-̍ [ ] 30

verses.padam: - Padam BAratI||mahI|gRuṇAnA||tat|naḥ|turIpa̱m|adBu̍tam|purukṣu|tvaṣṭA̱|suvIramiti̍# su - vIra̱m||rAyaḥ|pOṣa̱m|vIti|syatu|nABi̱m|asmE̍ iti||vana̍spatE|avEti̍|sRuja|rarA̍ṇaḥ|tmanA̱|dEvEṣu̍||agniḥ|havyam|śamitA|sUdayAti||agnE̱|svAhA̱|kRuṇuhi|jAtavEda̍ iti# jAta - vEdaḥ|indrAya|havyam||viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|haviḥ|idam|juṣantAm||hiraṇyagarBa̍ iti# hiraṇya-garBaḥ|samiti|avartata|agrE̱|BUtasya̍|jAtaḥ|pati̍ḥ|Eka̍ḥ|AsIt||saḥ|dAdhAra|pRuthivIm|dyAm|31̍ (50)
verses.samhita: BAratI|mahI̍ gRuṇAnA||tanna̍sturIpamadBu̍taM̍ purukṣu tvaṣṭA# suvIra̱M|rAyaspOṣaM ~Mvi ṣyatu̍ nABimasmE||vana̍spatE&va̍# sRujA rarAṇastmanA̍# dEvEṣu|agniṛhavyaṃ̍ śamitA̍ sUdayAti||agnE̍ svAhA# kRuṇuhi jAtavEda indrAya̍ havyaM|viśvE# dEvA haviridaM juṣantAM||hiraṇyagarBaḥ̍ samavartatAgrE̍# BUtasya# jAtaḥ patirEka# AsIt|sa dAdhAra̍ pRuthivIM dyA - [ ] 31

verses.padam: - Padam uta|imAm|kasmai̱|dEvAya|haviṣA̱|vidhEma||yaḥ|prAṇata̍ iti# pra - anataḥ|nimiṣata iti# ni - miṣataḥ|mahitvEti# mahi - tvA|Ekaḥ|it|rAjA̱|jaga̍taḥ|baBUva̍||yaḥ|IśE̱|asya|dvipada̍ iti# dvi - padaḥ|catu̍ṣpada̍ iti catuḥ̍ - padaḥ|kasmai̱|dEvAya|haviṣA̱|vidhEma||yaḥ|AtmadA̍ ityA̱tma-dAḥ|baladA iti# bala-dAḥ|yasya|viśvE̱|upAsa̍ta̍ ityupa̍ - AsatE|praśiṣamiti̍# pra - śiṣa̱m|yasya|dEvAḥ||yasya̍|CAyA|amRuta̱m|yasya̍|mRutyuḥ|kasmai̱|dEvAya̍|haviṣA̱|vidhEma||yasya̍|imE|himava̍nta̍ iti# hima - vantaḥ|mahitvEti# mahi - tvA|yasya|samudram|rasayA̱|saha|32̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -mutEmAM kasmai# dEvAya# haviṣA# vidhEma||yaḥ prAṇatO̍ nimiṣatO̍ mahitvaika̍ idrAjA jagatO̍ baBUva|ya̍ IśE# asya dvipadaścatuṣpadaQḥkasmai̍# dEvAya# haviṣA# vidhEma||ya A̱tmadA baladA̍ yasya viśva# upAsatE̍ praśiṣaM ~Myasya# dEvAḥ|yasya# CAyA&mRutaM ~Myasya# mRutyuḥ kasmai# dEvAya# haviṣA# vidhEma||yasyEmE himavantO̍ mahitvA yasya# samudraṃ rasayA# sahA - [ ] 32

verses.padam: - Padam Ahuḥ||yasya|imAḥ|pradiśa̍ iti# pra-diśaḥ|yasya̍|bAhU̍ iti|kasmai̱|dEvAya̍|haviṣA̱|vidhEma||yam|kranda̍sI̍ iti|ava̍sA|tastaBAnE̍ iti|aByaikṣE̍tAmitya̍Bi̍ - aikṣEtAM|mana̍sA|rEja̍mAnE̍ iti||yatra̍|adhIti̍|sUra̍ḥ|udi̍tAvityut̍ - itau|vyEtIti# vi - Eti|kasmai̱|dEvAya̍|haviṣA̱|vidhEma||yEna̍|dyauḥ|ugrA|pRuthivI|ca|dRuḍhE̍ iti|yEna̍|suva̍ḥ|staBitam|yEna̍|nAka̍ḥ||yaḥ|antari̍kṣE|raja̍saḥ|vimAna̍ iti# vi-mAnaḥ|kasmai̱|dEvAya̍|haviṣA̱|vidhEma||Apa̍ḥ|ha|yat|mahatIḥ|viśva̱m|33̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -&&huḥ|yasyEmAḥ pradiśO yasya# bAhU kasmai# dEvAya# haviṣA# vidhEma||yaM krandasI̍ avasA̍ tastaBAnE aByaikṣEtAM̍ manasA̍ rEjamAnE|yatrAdhi̍ sUra uditau̍ vyEti kasmai# dEvAya# haviṣA# vidhEma||yEna dyaurugrA pRuthivI̍ ca# dRuḍhE yEna suvaḥ̍ staBitaM ~MyEna nAkaḥ|yO̍ antarikṣE̍ rajasO̍ vimAnaQḥkasmai# dEvAya# haviṣA# vidhEma||ApO# ha yanmahatI̍ rviśva - [ ] 33

verses.padam: - Padam Ayann|dakṣa̱m|dadhA̍nAḥ|janaya̍ntIḥ|agnim||tata̍ḥ|dEvAnA̱m|niriti̍|avartata|asu̍ḥ|Eka̍ḥ|kasmai̱|dEvAya̍|haviṣA̱|vidhEma||yaḥ|cit|Apa̍ḥ|mahinA|paryapa̍śyaditi̍# pari-apaśyat|dakṣa̱m|dadhA̍nAḥ|janaya̍ntIḥ|agnim||yaḥ|dEvEṣu̍|adhIti̍|dEvaḥ|Eka̍ḥ|AsI̱t|kasmai̱|dEvAya̍|haviṣA̱|vidhEma||34̍ (34) (agnEḥ sa - sarasvatI̍ - dyAṃ - saha - viśvaM - catustriṃśacca)̍ (A8)
verses.samhita: -mAyan dakṣaM dadhAnA̍ janayantIragniM|tatO̍# dEvAnAM niravartatAsurEkaQḥkasmai̍# dEvAya# haviṣA# vidhEma||yaścidApO# mahinA paryapaśyad-dakṣaM̍ dadhAnA̍ janayantIragniM|yO̍ dEvEṣvadhi# dEva Eka AsIt kasmai# dEvAya# haviṣA# vidhEma||34 (agnEḥ sa - sarasvatI̍ - dyAṃ - saha - viśvaM - catustriṃśacca)̍ (A8) special KOrvai for anuvAkam 29 to 34

verses.padam: - Padam AkUtimityA̍ - kUtim|agnim|prayujamiti# pra - yuja̱m|svAhA̱|manaḥ|mEdhAm|agnim|prayujamiti̍# pra-yuja̱m|svAhA̱|cittam|vijñAtamiti̍# vi - jñAtam|agnim|prayujamiti# pra - yuja̱m|svAhA̱|vAcaḥ|vidhRutimiti̍ vi-dhRutim|agnim|prayujamiti# pra - yuja̱m|svAhA̱|prajApataya̍ iti# prajA - patayE|manavE|svAhA̱|agnayE̱|vaiśvAnarAya̍|svAhA̱|viśvE̱|dEvasya̍|nEtuḥ|marta̍ḥ|vRuṇIta|saKyam|viśvE̱|rAyaḥ|iṣuddhyasi|dyumnam|vRuṇIta|puṣyasE̱|svAhA̱|mA|sviti̍|BitthAḥ|mA|sviti̍|riṣaḥ|dRuṃha̍sva|vIḍaya̍sva|su||abaM̍|dhRuṣṇu|vIraya̍sva|35̍ (50)
verses.samhita: AkUtimagniM̍ prayujaṅq svAhA manO# mEdhAmagniM prayujaṅq svAhA# cittaM ~MvijñAtamagniM̍ prayujaṅq svAhA# vAcO vidhRutimagniM̍ prayujaṅq svAhA̱ prajApatayE̍ manavE̍ svAhA&gnayE# vaiśvAnarAya svAhA viśvE# dEvasya# nEturmartO# vRuṇIta saKyaM ~MviśvE# rAya iṣuddhyasi̍ dyumnaM ~MvRuṇIta̍ puṣyasE svAhA mA su BitthA̍ mA su riṣO̍ dRuṃhasva̍ vIḍayasva̍ su|abaM̍ dhRuṣṇu vIrayasvA̍ - [ ] 35

verses.padam: - Padam agniḥ|ca|idam|kariṣyathaḥ||dRuṃhasva|dEvi|pRuthivi|svastayE̱|AsurI|mAyA|svadhayEti̍# sva - dhayA̱|kRutA|asi||juṣṭa̱m|dEvAnA̱m|idam|astu|havyam|ariṣṭA|tvam|uditi̍|ihi|yajñE|asminn||mitra̍|EtAm|uKAm|tapa|EṣA|mA|BEdi||EtAm|tE|parIti̍|dadAmi|aBi̍ttyai||dr^^va̍nna̍ iti dru - annaḥ|sarpirAsutiriti̍# sarpiḥ - Asutiḥ|pratnaḥ|hOtA̱|varE̱ṇyaḥ||sahasaḥ|putraḥ|adBu̍taḥ||para̍syAḥ|adhIti̍|saM~Mvata̍ iti# saM - vataḥ|ava̍rAn|aBi|Eti̍|36̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -&gniścEdaM kariṣyathaḥ||dRuṃha̍sva̍ dEvi pRuthivi svastaya# AsurI mAyA svadhayA# kRutA&si|juṣṭa̍M̍ dEvAnAmidama̍stu̍ havyamariṣṭA̍ tvamudihi̍ yajñE asminn||mitraitAmuKAM tapaiṣA̍ mA BEdi|EtAM̍ tE pari# dadAmyaBittyai||drva̍nnaḥ̍ sarpirAsutiḥ̍ pratnO hOtA varE̱ṇyaḥ|sahasasputrO̍ adButaḥ||para̍syA̍ adhi# saM~MvatO&varAṃ̍ aByA - [ ] 36

verses.padam: - Padam tara||yatra|aham|asmi̍|tAn|ava||paramasyA̱ḥ|parAvata̍ iti# parA - vataḥ|rOhida̍śva̍ iti# rOhit - aśvaḥ|iha|Eti|gahi||purIṣya̍ḥ|purupriya̍ iti# puru - priyaḥ|agnE̱|tvam|tara|mRudhaḥ||sIda̍|tvam|mAtuḥ|asyAḥ|upastha̍ ityupa - sthE|viśvAni|agnE|vayunA̍ni|vidvAn||mA|EnAm|arciṣA̱|mA|tapa̍sA|aBIti̍|śUśucaḥ|antaḥ|asyAm|śukrajyO̍tiriti̍# śukra - jyOtiḥ|vIti|BAhi||antaḥ|agnE|rucA|tvam|uKAyai̱|sada̍nE|svE||tasyA̱ḥ|tvam|hara̍sA|tapann̍# ( )|jAtavEda̍ iti jAta-vEdaḥ|śivaḥ|Bava||śivaḥ|BUtvA|mahya̱m|agnE|athO̍ iti|sIda|śivaḥ|tvam||śivAḥ|kRutvA|diśa̍ḥ|sarvA̱ḥ|svAm|yOni̱m|iha|Eti̍|asadaḥ||37̍ (70) (vIrayasvA - && - tapan̍ - viṃśatiśca)̍ (A9)
verses.samhita: tara|yatrAhamasmi̍ tAṃ ava||paramasyA̱ḥ̍ parAvatO# rOhidaśva̍ ihA&*gahi|purIṣya̍ḥ̍ purupriyO&gnE tvaM tarA̍ mRudhaḥ||sIda̍ tvaM mAturasyA upasthE viśvA̱nyagnE vayunAni̍ vidvAn|mainAmarciṣA̍ mA tapasA&Bi̍ śUśucO&ntara̍syAṃ̍ śukra jyOtirvi̍ BAhi||antara̍gnE̍ rucA tvamuKAyai sadanE̍ svE|tasyAstvaṃ harasA̍ tapan ( ) jAtavEdaḥ̍ śivO Bava||śivO̍ BUtvA mahyamagnE&thO̍# sIda śivastvaM|śivAḥ kRutvA diśaḥ sarvAḥ svAM ~MyOnimihA&&sa̍daḥ||37̍ (vIrayasvA - && - tapan̍ - viṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam yat|agnE|yAni|kAni̍|ca|Eti̍|tE|dArU̍ṇi|daddhmasi̍||tat|astu|tuBya̱m|it|GRutam|tat|juṣasva|yaviṣṭhya||yat|atti̍|upajihvikEtyu̍pa̍ - jihvikA|yat|vamraḥ|atisarpatItya̍ti-sarpa̍ti||sarva̱m|tat|astu|tE|GRutam|tat|juṣasva|yaviṣṭhya||rAtriṃ̍rAtrimiti̍ rAtri̱m - rAtrim|aprayAvamityapra̍-yAvam|Bara̍ntaḥ|aśvA̍ya|iva|tiṣṭha̍tE|GAsam|asmai||rAyaḥ|pOṣE̍ṇa|samiti̍|iṣA|mada̍ntaḥ|agnE̱|mA|tE|prati̍vEśA̍ iti prati# - vEśAḥ|riṣAma||nABA̱|38 (50)
verses.samhita: yadagnE̍ yAni kAni cA&&tE dArUṇi̍ daddhmasi|tada̍stu̍ tuByamid-GRutaM tajjuṣasva̍ yaviṣṭhya||yadattyupajihvi̍kA̍ yadvamrO atisarpa̍ti|sarvaM̍ tadastu̍ tE GRutaM tajjuṣasva̍ yaviṣṭhya||rAtriṃ# rAtrimaprayAvaM̍ BarantO&śvAyEva̍ tiṣṭhatE̍ GAsamasmai|rAyaspOṣE̍ṇa̍ samiṣA madantO&gnE mA tE prativEśA̍ riṣAma||nABA# - [ ] 38

verses.padam: - Padam pRuthivyAḥ|samidhAnamiti# saM-idhAnam|agnim|rAyaḥ|pOṣAya|bRuhatE|havAmahE||iramaMqdamitI̍raM̍ - madam|bRuhadukthamiti̍# bRuhat - uktham|yajatram|jEtA̍ram|agnim|pRuta̍nAsu|sAsahim||yAḥ|sEnA̱ḥ|aBItva̍rIritya̍Bi̍ - itvarIḥ|AvyAdhinIrityA̱̍ - vyAdhinI̱ḥ|ugaṇAḥ|uta||yE|stEnAḥ|yE|ca|taska̍rAḥ|tAn|tE|agnE|apIti̍|dadhAmi|AsyE̱||daṅṣṭrA̱ByAm|malimlUnn̍|jaMByai̱ḥ|taska̍rAn|uta||hanU̱ByAmiti̍ hanu# - ByAm|stEnAn|Bagava iti# Baga - vaḥ|tAn|tvam|KAda|suKAditAniti̍ su - KAditAn||yE|janEṣu|malimla̍vaḥ|stEnAsa̍ḥ|taska̍rAḥ|vanE̱||yE|39̍ (50)
verses.samhita: pRuthivyAḥ samidhA-namagniṃ̍ rAyaspOṣAya̍ bRuhatE havAmahE|irammadaM̍ bRuhadukthaM̍ ~MyajatraM̍ jEtAramagniM̍ pRutanAsu̍ sAsahiM||yAḥ sEnA# aBItvarIrA-vyAdhinI-ruga̍ṇA̍ uta|yE stEnA yE ca taskarAstAṅstE̍# agnE&pi# dadhAmyAsyE̱||daṅṣṭrA̱ByAM malimlUn jaMByai-staskarAṃ̍ uta|hanU̱ByAṅ stEnAn-BagavastAṅ-stvaM̍ KAda̍ suKAditAn||yE̍ janEṣu̍ malimlavaḥ̍ stEnAsa-staskarA̍ vanE̱|yE - [ ] 39

verses.padam: - Padam kakṣEṣu|aGAyava̍ ityaGa̍ - yavaḥ|tAn|tE|dadhAmi|jaMBa̍yOḥ||yaḥ|asmaByamityasma-Byam|arAtIyAt|yaḥ|ca|naḥ|dvEṣa̍tE|jana̍ḥ||nindA̱t|yaḥ|asmAn|diPsA̱t|ca|sarva̱m|tam|masmasA|kuru||saṃśi̍tamiti̍ saM - śitam|mE|brahma|saṃśi̍tamiti̍ saM - śitam|vIrya̱m|bala̱m||saṃśitamiti̍ saM - śitam|kṣatram|jiṣṇu|yasya|aham|asmi̍|purOhi̍ta̍ iti# puraḥ - hitaḥ||uditi|EṣAm|bAhU̍ iti|atiram|uditi̍|varca̍ḥ|uditi̍|u|bala̱m||kṣiṇOmi̍|brahma̍ṇA|amitrAn̍|uditi̍|nayAmi|40̍ (50)
verses.samhita: kakṣE̱ṣvaGA yavastAṅstE# dadhAmi jaMBayOḥ||yO̍ asmaByamarAtIyAd-yaśca̍# nO dvEṣatE̍ janaḥ|nindAdyO̍ asmAn diPsA̱cca sarvaM taM masmasA̍ kuru||saṃśi̍taM̍ mE brahma saṃśitaM̍ ~MvIryaM̍ bala̱M|saṃśitaM̍ kṣatraM jiṣṇu yasyA&hamasmi# purOhitaḥ||udE̍ṣAM̍ bAhU atiramudvarca̍ udU bala̱M|kṣiṇOmi brahmaṇA-&mitrAnunna̍yAmi̍ - [ ] 40

verses.padam: - Padam svAn|aham||dRuśAnaḥ|rukmaḥ|urvyA|vIti|adyaut|durmaṛṣamiti̍# duḥ - maṛṣa̱m|Ayuḥ|śriyE|rucAnaḥ||agniḥ|amRuta̍ḥ|aBavat|vayO̍Biriti̍ vayaḥ̍ - Biḥ|yat|Enam|dyauḥ|ajanayat|surEtA̍ iti# su - rEtA̱ḥ||viśvA̱|rUpAṇi|pratIti̍|mu~jcatE|kaviḥ|prEti̍|asAvIt|Badram|dvipada̍ iti# dvi-padE̱|catuṣpada̍ iti catuḥ̍ - padE||vIti|nAka̱m|aKyat|savitA|varE̱ṇyaḥ|anviti̍|prayAṇamiti̍# pra - yAna̱m|uṣasaḥ|vIti̍|rAjati||naktOṣAsA̱|sama̍nasEti̍ sa - manasA|virUpE̍ iti vi-rUpE|dhApayEtE̍ iti|śiśu̱m|Eka̱m|samIcI̍ iti||dyAvA̱|kṣAma̍|rukmaḥ|41̍ (50)
verses.samhita: svAṃ ahaM||dRuśAnO rukma urvyA vyadyauddurmaṛṣamAyu̍ḥ̍ śriyE rucAnaḥ|agniramRutO̍# aBavadvayO-BiryadE̍naM̍ dyaurajanayath̍ surEtA̱ḥ||viśvA# rUpAṇi prati# mu~jcatE kaviḥ prA&sAvIdBadraM̍ dvipadE catuṣpadE|vi̍ nAkamaKyath̍ savitA varEṇyO&nu# prayAṇamuṣasO̍ virAjati||naktOṣAsA̍ samanasA̍ virUpE̍ dhApayEtE̍ śiśumEkaṃ# samIcI|dyAvA kṣAmA# rukmO - [ ] 41

verses.padam: - Padam antaḥ|vIti|BAti|dEvAḥ|agnim|dhArayann|draviṇOdA̍ iti# draviṇaḥ - dAḥ||suparṇa iti# su - parṇaḥ|asi|garutmAn|trivRuditi̍# tri - vRut|tE|śiraḥ|gAyatram|cakṣu̍ḥ|stOma̍ḥ|AtmA|sAma̍|tE|tanUḥ|vAmadEvyamiti̍# vAma - dEvyam|bRuhadrathantarE iti# bRuhat - rathantarE|pakṣau|yajñAyajñiya̱m|pucCa̱m|CandAṃsi|a~ggA̍ni|dhiṣṇi̍yAḥ|śaPAḥ|yajUṃ̍ṣi|nAma̍||suparṇa̍ iti# su - parṇaḥ|asi|garutmAn|diva̱m|gacCa|suva̍ḥ|pata||42̍ (38) (nABA - vanE yE - nayAmi̍ - kṣAmA# rukmO̱ - &ṣṭAtriṃśacca)̍ (A10)
verses.samhita: antarvi BAti̍ dEvA agniM dhArayan̍ draviṇOdAḥ||suparṇO&si̍ garutmA̱n trivRuttE śirO# gAyatraM cakṣuḥ stOma# AtmA sAma# tE tanUrvAmadEvyaM̍ bRuhad-rathantarE̍ pakṣau yajñAyajñiyaM̍ pucCaM CandAṅqsya~ggAni̍ dhiṣṇiyAḥ̍ śaPA yajUṃṣi̍ nAma||suparṇO̍&si̍ garutmAn divaM̍ gacCa suvaḥ̍ pata||42 (nABA - vanE yE - nayAmi̍ - kṣAmA# rukmO̱ - &ṣṭAtriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam agnE̱|yam|yajñam|addhvaram|viśvataḥ|pariBUriti̍# pari - BUḥ|asi||saḥ|it|dEvEṣu̍|gacCati||sOma̍|yAḥ|tE|mayOBuva̍ iti# mayaḥ - Buvaḥ|Utaya̍ḥ|santi̍|dAśuṣE̱||tABi̍ḥ|naḥ|avitA|Bava||agniḥ|mUd^^rdhA|Buva̍ḥ||tvam|naḥ|sOma|yA|tE|dhAmA̍ni||tat|savituḥ|varE̱ṇyam|Barga̍ḥ|dEvasya̍|dhImahi||dhiya̍ḥ|yaḥ|naḥ|pracOdayAditi̍# pra-cOdayA̱t||acittI|yat|cakRuma|daivyE̱|janE̱|dInaiḥ|dakṣai̱ḥ|praBUtIti̍ pra - BUtI|pUruṣatvatEti# pUruṣa - tvatA̱||43 (50)
verses.samhita: tvannaḥ̍ sOma >3 , yA tE dhAmAni̍ >4|tvaM naḥ̍ sOma viśvatO rakṣA# rAjannaGAyataḥ|na riṣyEt̍ tvAvataḥ̍ saKA̱ḥ||yA tE dhAmAni̍ divi yA pRuthivyAM̍ ~MyA parvatEṣvOṣa̍dhIṣvaPsu|tEBi̍rnO̍ viśvai̱ḥ sumanA ahEḍan̍ rAjaṉth-sOma prati# havyA gRuBAya||

verses.padam: - Padam dEvEṣu|ca|savitaḥ|mAnuṣEṣu|ca|tvam|naḥ|atra̍|suvatAt|anA̍gasaḥ||cOdayitrI|sUnRutA̍nAm|cEta̍ntI|sumatInAmiti̍# su - matInAm||yajñam|dadhE|sarasvatI||pAvI̍ravI|kanyA̱|citrAyuriti̍# citra - Ayuḥ|sarasvatI|vIrapatnIti̍# vIra - patnI|dhiya̱m|dhAt||gnABiḥ|acCi̍dram|śaraṇam|sajOṣA̍ iti# sa-jOṣA̱ḥ|durAdhaṛṣamiti# duḥ - Adhaṛṣa̱m|gRuṇatE|śarma|yaṃqsat||pUṣA|gAḥ|anviti̍|Etu|naḥ|pUṣA|rakṣatu|arva̍taḥ||pUṣA|vAja̱m|sanOtu|naḥ||śukram|tE|anyat|yajatam|tE|anyat|44̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEvEṣu# ca savitarmAnuṣEṣu̍ ca tvannO atra# suvatAdanAgasaḥ||cOdayitrI̍ sUnRutAnAM̍ cEtantI̍ sumatInAM|yajñaM dadhE̍ sarasvatI||pAvI̍ravI̍ kanyA# citrAyuḥ sarasvatI̍ vIrapatnI̍ dhiyaM̍ dhAt|gnABiracCidraṃ̍ śaraṇaṃ sajOṣA# durAdhaṛṣaM̍ gRuṇatE śarma# yaṃsat||pUṣA gA anvEtu̍ naḥ pUṣA rakṣatvarva̍taḥ|pUṣA̍ vAjaṃ# sanOtu naḥ||śukraM tE# anyadyajataM̍ tE# anya - [ ] 44

verses.padam: - Padam viṣurUpE̍ iti viṣu# - rUpE|ahanI̍ iti|dyauḥ|iva|asi||viśvA̱ḥ|hi|mAyAḥ|ava̍si|svadhAva̍ iti# svadhA - vaḥ|BadrA|tE|pUṣann|iha|rAtiḥ|astu||tE|avad^^rdhanta|svatavasa̍ iti sva - tavasaḥ|mahitvanEti# mahi - tvanA|Eti|nAka̱m|tasthuḥ|uru|cakrirE|sada̍ḥ||viṣṇu̍ḥ|yat|ha|Ava̍t|vRuṣa̍ṇam|madacyutamiti̍# mada - cyuta̱m|vayaḥ|na|sIdann|adhIti̍|barqḥiṣi̍|priyE||prEti̍|citram|arkam|gRuṇatE|turAya̍|mAru̍tAya|svata̍vasa̍ iti sva - tavasE|Baraddhvam||yE|sahAṃsi|saha̍sA|saha̍ntE|45̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -dviṣurUpE̍ ahanI̍ dyaurivAsi|viśvA̍ hi mAyA avasi̍ svadhAvO BadrA tE# pUṣanniha rAtirastu||tE̍&varddhanta̍ svatavasO̍ mahitvanA &&nAkaM̍ tasthururu cakrirE̍ sadaḥ|viṣṇu̍ ryaddhA&&vad-vRuṣaṇaM̍ madacyutaM ~MvayO na sIdannadhi̍# barqḥiṣi# priyE||pracitramarkaM gRuṇatE̍ turAya mArutAya̍ svatavasE̍ BaraddhvaM|yE sahAṃsi̍ sahasA̍ sahantE̍ - [ ] 45

verses.padam: - Padam rEjatE|agnE|pRuthivI|maKEBya̍ḥ||viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|viśvE̱|dEvAḥ||dyAvA̱|naḥ|pRuthivI̍ iti|imam|siddhram|adya|divispRuśamiti̍# divi - spRuśa̱m||yajñam|dEvEṣu|yacCatAm||prEti̍|pUrvajE̍ iti# pUrva-jE|pitarA̱|navyasIBiḥ|gIrBiḥ|kRuṇuddhvam|sada̍nE̍ iti|Rutasya̍||Eti̍|naḥ|dyAvApRuthivI̍ iti# dyAvA-pRuthivI|daivyEna|janE̍na|yAtam|mahi̍|vAm|varU̍tham||agnim|stOmE̍na|bOdhaya|samidhAna̍ iti# saM - idhAnaḥ|amartyam||havyA|dEvEṣu̍|naḥ|dadhat||saḥ|havyavAḍiti̍# havya - vAṭ|amartyaḥ|uśik|dUtaḥ|canO̍hitaḥ̍ ( )||agniḥ|dhiyA|samiti|Ruṇvati||śam|naḥ|Bavantu|vAjE̍vAja̍ iti vAjE̱ - vAjE||46 (58) Praśna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 11 Anuvaakams :- (yu~jjAna - imAmagRuBṇan̍ - dEvasya - santE - vi pAjasA̍ - vasavastvA̍ - samA̱stvO - d^^rdhvA - asyAkUtiM̍ - ~MyadagnE̍ yAn - yagnE yaM ~Myajña - mEkAdaśa)̍ Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Panchaatis :- (yu~jjAnO - varma# ca stha - AdityastvA - BAratI̍ - svAṃ ahaṃ - ṣaṭcatvAriṃśat̍ ) First and Last Padam of First Prasnam of Kandam 4 :- (yu~jjAnO - vAjEvAjE̍ )||hariḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pada pAṭhE caturtha kAṇḍE prathamaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||
verses.samhita: -śannO# Bavantu>7 , vAjEvAja>̍ 8|mitadravaḥ̍ sahasrasA mEdhasAtA̍ saniṣyavaḥ|mahO̍ yE ratnaṃ# samithEṣu# jaBrirE śannO# Bavantu vAjinO havEṣu||vAjE̍vAjE̍ &vata vAjinO nO dhanEṣu̍ viprA amRutA RutajñAḥ||
